About Us

Studio AB-APX was founded by Architect Angel Angelov and Architect Veselina Angelova back in 1993 in Sofia, Bulgaria.

Since then the office has established a stable reputation all around Bulgaria. The office is well known for its expertise in the field of residential and public buildings as well as in the planning of industrial and agricultural buildings.

Along classic architectural work we also provide all the support services construction requires - from general planning to construction management and authorisation for bringing into service.

As a general contractor we are working with a specialized team of professionals able to satisfy all stages of project planning and implementation.
